articles.title: Regional Synthesis Report – Europe & Central Asia Sendai Framework Midterm Review Process, November 2022 - World - ReliefWeb
articles.description: Evaluation and Lessons Learned in English on World and 8 other countries about Disaster Management, Drought, Earthquake and more; published on 4 Feb 2023 by UNDRR
articles.content: Introduction The Sendai Framework (SF) for Disaster Risk Reduction (DRR) 2015-2030 was adopted during the Third United Nations World Conference on DRR. The Sendai Framework was subsequently endorsed … [+3248 chars]
